comments: He is mentioned in his father's death notice in Bull. Soc. Bot. France, 35: 179 (1888) Timbal laisse un fils...
examples: Aconitum occidentale Timb.-Lag.f., Aconit Napel Pyrenees: 6 (1880), n.v.
source: R.J.Pankhurst. MedChecklist, 4: 389 (1989). Font Quer in Collect. Bot., 1: 290 (1947).
